column1: Perfect, so what part of the VR cities or VR offered - stood out to you in the stories that you watched?
I feel like the first part, that was my favorite.
like the robot part where like the robot came in, I was like so confused.
Awesome. What kind of problems do you think VR might create for you as a kid?
You would just spend a lot of time doing it instead of, like, working.
Yeah? You would just spend a lot of time doing it?
Who do you think should decide which VR experiences are a good choice for children?
Should it be like parents, teachers?
When VR makers are creating VR experiences for children what do you think they should keep in mind?
To like, so, like they can learn while doing
Learn while doing VR? Awesome. Is there anything else you want to tell me about how you liked VR, what you didn't like?
Awesome, well thank you so so much.
